Name: Staff Point
Action Data (JSON): {"type": "staff_points", "value": "1 if log.activity and log.activity in ['Buy', 'Sell'] else 3 if (log.activity and log.activity in ['RP']) or log.event in ['level_up'] else 10 if (log.activity and log.activity in ['Quest']) or log.event in ['new_character'] else 0"}

Name: Public Log Display
Condition Expression: log.event in ['reward'] or log.activity and  log.activity in ['Buy', 'Sell']

Name: Patrol
Action Data (JSON): {"xp": "server.currency_limit(player, character)*(0.4 if patrol.outcome == 'extreme_clear' else 0.3 if patrol.outcome == 'full_clear' else 0.2 if patrol.outcome == 'half_clear' else 0.1 if patrol.outcome == 'failure' else 0)", "type": "reward", "host_xp": "server.currency_limit(player, character)*(0.5 if patrol.outcome == 'extreme_clear' else 0.4 if patrol.outcome == 'full_clear' else 0.3 if patrol.outcome == 'half_clear' else 0.1 if patrol.outcome == 'failure' else 0)", "activity": "Patrol", "currency": "server.currency_limit(player, character)*(0.4 if patrol.outcome == 'extreme_clear' else 0.3 if patrol.outcome == 'full_clear' else 0.2 if patrol.outcome == 'half_clear' else 0.1 if patrol.outcome == 'failure' else 0)", "host_currency": "server.currency_limit(player, character)*(0.5 if patrol.outcome == 'extreme_clear' else 0.4 if patrol.outcome == 'full_clear' else 0.3 if patrol.outcome == 'half_clear' else 0.1 if patrol.outcome == 'failure' else 0)"}
